Name: Team Size Limit
Description: Ensure each Scrum team has no more than 9 members

Name: Developer Availability
Description: Maintain at least 80% availability per developer

Name: Skill Level Threshold
Description: Require skill level of at least 3 for key competencies

Name: Sprint Duration Limit
Description: Keep sprint length at most 14 days

Name: Sprint Planning Duration
Description: Allocate no more than 120 minutes for sprint planning

Name: Daily Scrum Duration
Description: Limit daily stand-up meetings to 15 minutes

Name: Retrospective Action Items
Description: Cap action items from retrospectives to 5 per sprint

Name: Defect Resolution Time
Description: Resolve bugs within 2 days of detection

Name: Story Points per Sprint
Description: Plan for at least 20 story points per sprint

Name: Backlog Items per Sprint
Description: Select no more than 20 backlog items for a sprint
